description: Contract must specify clear termination conditions and notice period
llm_prompt: Analyze this contract text and determine if it clearly specifies termination conditions. Look for: 1) Termination triggers or events, 2) Notice period requirements, 3) Termination procedures. Provide specific quotes.

llm_examples.text: Either party may terminate this agreement upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to the other party.
llm_examples.rationale: Clear termination clause with specific 30-day notice period

llm_examples.text: This agreement shall continue until terminated.
llm_examples.rationale: Vague termination clause without specific conditions or notice period

compliance_levels.compliant: Contract has clear termination clause with specific notice period and procedures
compliance_levels.non_compliant: No termination clause or vague/ambiguous termination conditions
compliance_levels.not_applicable: Document type does not require termination provisions (e.g., one-time purchase order)
compliance_levels.unknown: Cannot determine termination provisions from available text

remediation_guidance: Add specific termination clause including: triggering events, notice period (typically 30-90 days), and termination procedures

description: Contract must specify payment terms including amount, schedule, and method
llm_prompt: Analyze this contract for payment terms. Identify: 1) Payment amounts or calculation methods, 2) Payment schedule/milestones, 3) Payment methods, 4) Due dates or terms (e.g., Net 30). Provide specific quotes.

compliance_levels.compliant: Clear payment terms including amount, schedule, and payment method
compliance_levels.unknown: Payment terms cannot be determined from available text

remediation_guidance: Specify: payment amount or rate, payment schedule/milestones, payment method, and payment terms (e.g., Net 30)

description: Contract must address limitation of liability and damages caps
llm_prompt: Review this contract for liability provisions. Identify: 1) Liability limitations or caps, 2) Excluded damages (consequential, indirect), 3) Exceptions to limitations. Provide specific quotes.

compliance_levels.compliant: Contract includes liability limitations with clear caps and exclusions
compliance_levels.non_compliant: No liability limitations or unlimited liability exposure
compliance_levels.not_applicable: Agreement type does not typically include liability provisions

remediation_guidance: Include limitation of liability clause with: damage caps, exclusion of consequential damages, and any exceptions

description: Contract must include confidentiality and non-disclosure provisions
llm_prompt: Analyze confidentiality provisions in this contract. Identify: 1) Definition of confidential information, 2) Obligations regarding confidential information, 3) Duration of confidentiality, 4) Exceptions. Provide quotes.

compliance_levels.compliant: Comprehensive confidentiality provisions with clear definitions and obligations
compliance_levels.non_compliant: No confidentiality provisions or inadequate protection
compliance_levels.not_applicable: Public or open-source agreement without confidentiality requirements

remediation_guidance: Add confidentiality clause defining: confidential information, protection obligations, duration, and standard exceptions

description: Contract must specify dispute resolution mechanism
llm_prompt: Review dispute resolution provisions. Identify: 1) Dispute resolution method (arbitration/litigation/mediation), 2) Governing law, 3) Jurisdiction/venue, 4) Escalation procedures. Provide quotes.

compliance_levels.compliant: Clear dispute resolution mechanism with governing law and jurisdiction
compliance_levels.not_applicable: Internal agreement without external dispute potential
compliance_levels.unknown: Dispute resolution provisions cannot be determined

remediation_guidance: Specify: dispute resolution method, governing law, jurisdiction/venue, and any escalation procedures
